SELECT C1.CNTR_NO , C1.CNTR_SN , S1.PDCT_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , E1.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD /*상품그룹코드*/ , C0.CNTR_CAN_DTM /*취소일시*/ /*설치일자가 없으면 사전BS 생성을 위해 현재일자로 세팅*/ , CASE WHEN S1.IST_DT IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ELSE S1.IST_DT END AS IST_DT /*설치일자*/ , C3.IST_DT AS IST_DT_CNTR /*설치일자-계약*/ , C1.SV_PRD /*서비스주기*/ , C1.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 2, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REQ_VST_DT , C3.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N /*무상BS기간수*/
, (SELECT CST_SV_ASN_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T /*고객서비스BS배정내역*/ WHERE T.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND T.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN) AS CST_SV_ASN_NO , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1), 'YYYYMM') AS ASN_OJ_YM
FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C0 ON C0.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C0.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NULL /*계약취소가 아니고*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ S1 ON S1.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND S1.IST_DT IS NULL /*설치일자가 없는건*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C3 ON C3.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C3.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C3.IST_DT IS NULL /*설치일자가 없는건*/ LEFT JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ B1 /*고객서비스정기BS주기내역*/ ON B1.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND B1.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND B1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B1.WK_SN = 1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON P1.PD_CD = C1.BASE_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL E1 ON E1.PD_CD = S1.PDCT_PD_CD AND E1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND E1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IN ('12', '13', '14', '15', '16') /*12 홈카페캡슐, 13 활력홍삼, 14 화장품, 15 슬림쏙, 16 백수오*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND C1.SELL_TP_CD = '6' /*정기배송*/ AND ((C0.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NULL AND B1.WK_SN IS NULL) /*정상건이나 BS주기 미생성시*/ OR (C0.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND B1.WK_SN IS NOT NULL) /*BS주기 생성후 계약취소*/ )
